structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.text: The provisions of KRS 61.410 to 61.500 shall be retrospective to January 1, 1951, and any agreement entered into pursuant to it may be made with retroactive effect to January 1, 1951, or any date thereafter.
law.history: Created 1951 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 12.

metadata.lrc-note: (11/15/90). Pursuant to KRS 7.136(1), the prior reference to KRS 195.100 contained in this section has been removed, that statute having been repealed by 1974 Acts Ch. 74, Art. VI, รยง 108.
